ComicInfo.Summary: MINISERIES CONCLUSION! The end of the mob as we know it. So bloody that we invented a word for it: “binge killing.” You thought you saw everything in the Games of Thrones-style penultimate issue? Think again! Richie Reese’s final fate is revealed here. Which side is hexon? Who’ll go with a smile? Also: the Hollywood Killer’s next adventure is teased here.
